title: [FEA] Support parquet.block.size to control row group size for parquet

labels.name: task
labels.description: Work required that improves the product but is not user facing

body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
spark-rapids does not support parquet.block.size.
File this issue to track.
Seems the cuDF already support this feature, but spark-rapids does not invoke.
```
    chunked_parquet_writer_options opts =
        chunked_parquet_writer_options::builder(sink)
            .set_row_group_size_bytes(xxx) //
            .build();
```

Update the following code to support.
[link](https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/blob/8150d38e080c8fb021921ade83fe3aa3be04b47d/java/src/main/native/src/TableJni.cpp#L1606-L1613) [link](
https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/blob/8150d38e080c8fb021921ade83fe3aa3be04b47d/java/src/main/native/src/TableJni.cpp#L1653-L1660)

```
    chunked_parquet_writer_options opts =
        chunked_parquet_writer_options::builder(sink)
            .metadata(std::move(metadata))
            .compression(static_cast<compression_type>(j_compression))
            .stats_level(static_cast<statistics_freq>(j_stats_freq))
            .key_value_metadata({kv_metadata})
            .compression_statistics(stats)
            .build();
```

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Support this feature



**Describe alternatives you've considered**
From Bobby: We really should output a large warning if parquet.block.size is set, as we cannot support it. 
**Additional context**
Refer to the comment: https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/9119#issuecomment-1695991152
